plot: Two girls befriend each other during a traumatic experience. Many years later they return to celebrate their survival, only to confront a new challenge to their friendship.
title: Beste Freundinnen
plot_es: Two girls befriend each other during a traumatic experience. Many years later they return to celebrate their survival, only to confront a new challenge to their friendship.
plot_en: Two girls befriend each other during a traumatic experience. Many years later they return to celebrate their survival, only to confront a new challenge to their friendship.
